      • generateLevels

        public void generateLevels(int number,
                           int requiredScore)
        Desc: This method generate a level. For this required the number ("id") and the score necesary to pass the level.
        Parameters:
        number - int. This param is the number or "id" of the level
        requiredScore - int. This param is the score necesary to pass the level Post:The level wiil be generated.

      • createPlayer

        public boolean createPlayer(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String nicKName)
        Desc: This method register a player in the system. For this, uses the constructor method fro Player class and saves the new player in players array
        Parameters:
        name - String. This param is the name of player
        nicKName - string. This param is the nickname of the player. The nickname cannot repeat in the videoGame
        Returns:
        boolean. It depence of if the accion was make or not Post:The player will be registered

      • showPlayers

        public java.lang.String showPlayers()
        Desc: This method makes a list with all names of players. For this, it walks all players array and it is getting and concatenating the names in a string.
        Returns:
        String. This string has all names of the players registered Post:The String that returned will be ready to use

      • createEnemy

        public boolean createEnemy(java.lang.String name,
                           int type,
                           int removeScore,
                           int giveScore,
                           int xPst,
                           int yPst)
        Desc: This method register an enemy in the system. For this it uses the constructor method from Enemy class and save the new enemy in the enemies array.
        Parameters:
        name - String. This is the name of new enemy
        type - int. This is the position of type at enum Type
        removeScore - int. this is the score that enemy will remove player if thisone lose against it.
        giveScore - int. This is the score taht enemy will give players if thisone beat it
        xPst - int. this is the x cordinate of the new enemy
        yPst - int. This is the y cordinate of the new enemy
        Returns:
        boolean. It depence of if the accion was make or not Post: The enemy should will be registered

        Returns:

      • addEnemyToLevel

        public boolean addEnemyToLevel(int position,
                               int level)
        Desc: This method saves an enemy in a enemies array of level. For this it requires the number of level and the position of enemy in enemies array.
        Parameters:
        position - int. This is the position of the enemy in enemies array of controller
        level - int. This is the number or "id" of the level
        Returns:
        boolean. It depence of if the accion was make or not Pre: The system must has enemies registered Post: The enemy should will be added to the level.

      • createTreasure

        public boolean createTreasure(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String imageUrl,
                              int giveScore,
                              int xPst,
                              int yPst)
        Desc: This method register an treasure in the system. For this it uses the constructor method from Treasure class and save the new teasure in the enemies array.
        Parameters:
        name - String. this is the name of new treasure
        imageUrl - Strig. This is the url of an image of the new treasure
        giveScore - int. This are the points that the user will get if find this treasure
        xPst - int. this is the x cordinate of the new treasure
        yPst - int. this is the y cordinate of the new treasure
        Returns:
        boolean. It depence of if the accion was make or not Post: The treasure should will be registered

      • addTreasureToLevel

        public boolean addTreasureToLevel(int position,
                                  int level,
                                  int reps)
        Desc: This method saves an treasure in a treasures array of level. For this it requires the number of level and the position of treasure in treasures array.
        Parameters:
        position - int. This is the position of the treasure in treasures array for controller
        level - int. this is the number or "id" of the level
        reps - int. This is the number of the same treasures the user would like add to the level
        Returns:
        boolean. It depence of if the accion was make or not Pre: The system must has treasures registered Post: The treasure should will be added to the level.

      • updateLevelDificult

        public void updateLevelDificult(int level)
        Desc: This method update the dificult of the level. The dificult depence of the score that enemies and reasure give.
        Parameters:
        level - int. this is the number or "id" of the level that the method is evaluating Pre: The level must have the ten levels intializated. Post: The level dificult will be updated.

      • modifyScoreToPlayer

        public void modifyScoreToPlayer(int position,
                                int points)
        Desc: This method add or remove score to playere. For this, the method just needs the position of player in players array and the score that is adding or removing.
        Parameters:
        position - int. This is the position of player in the players array
        points - int. This is the score that will be operated whit the player score Pre: The system must has players registered Post: The player score will be modified

      • increaseLevelOfPlayer

        public boolean increaseLevelOfPlayer(int position,
                                     int leveles)
        Desc: This method increase level of player if the player has the points necesary to pass the levels entered.
        Parameters:
        position - int. This is the position of player in players array.
        leveles - int. This id the number of level that user would like up the player
        Returns:
        boolean. It depence of if the accion was make or not Pre: The system must has players registered and the ten levels initialized Post: If player have the necesary score, The player will be in the level entered

        public java.lang.String allTreasuresAndEnemies(int position)

        Parameters:
        position - int. This es number or "id" of the level that the user would like knows what enemies an treasures have the level.
        Returns:
        String. This String has a mesage whit treasures an enemies or the message: "There are not enemies and treasures in this level" Pre: The system must has the ten levels intializated Post: The String will be ready to show to player
